text_content.color_adjustment: Match colors to main image and content
text_content.font_adjustment: Align fonts with main image and magazine theme

magazine_date.color_adjustment: Match date color to central image

title.color_adjustment: Match title color to central image

instructions: Do not alter the size, type, font, or position of the magazine title, date, or QR code.
The magazine date should automatically use the current system date in the format 'DD MMM YYYY' (e.g., '26 Jan 2026').
